resources.title: Encrypting a JSON Web Token in Erlang, using JOSE
resources.description: Step-by-step JOSE example for signing and encrypting JWTs (Erlang, applicable to Elixir).

resources.title: Elixir and Phoenix Decoded: Configuring Guardian and GuardianDB
resources.description: Tutorial that includes generating Guardian secret keys using JOSE.

resources.title: Using Joken for JWE? (discussion referencing erlang-jose)
resources.description: Elixir Forum thread on when to use JOSE directly for JWE versus higher-level JWT libraries.
